LanguageData.CarpetBedGreen.label: 绿色地毯
LanguageData.CarpetBedGreen.description: 褪色的绿地毯，适合铺设在卧室。
LanguageData.CarpetBedOrange.label: 橙色地毯
LanguageData.CarpetBedOrange.description: 沉实的橙色地毯，适合铺设在卧室。
LanguageData.CarpetBedBlue.label: 蓝色地毯
LanguageData.CarpetBedBlue.description: 让人放松的蓝色地毯，适合铺设在卧室。
LanguageData.CarpetBedMaroon.label: 栗色地毯
LanguageData.CarpetBedMaroon.description: 让人沉静栗色地毯，适合铺设在卧室。
